Subject: The Great Battle
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He arrived at the battle between Optimus Prime and Galvatron.
He transformed, and took in the view. He started to run in to help but
stoped. He wasn't going to repeat what happaned at Autobot City in 2005.
He wasn't getting Prime killed this time.
"Come on Optimus, you can do it!"
